Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan's head coach Jonathan Trott identified areas to improve after their massive 104-run defeat in the last group match of the T20 World Cup 2024 against West Indies.
Trott emphasized the need for Afghanistan to improve their bowling, particularly in the powerplay, ahead of their Super 8 encounter against India.
Trott praised the West Indies batters for making perfect use of the conditions, highlighting the wind factor and the need for better bowling strategies.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan finished second in Group C with three out of four possible wins.
Afghanistan will face India in their next match in T20 World Cup 2024 on June 20, 2024, in Barbados at 10:30 AM local time.
